channel.title: Chat text color & starting outfit
channel.description:
How do you change the color of the text in the chat box, like when a player types something?
Also, how do I make it so that when you make a new account you start off wearing armour,weapon, cape, etc? I looked in player.java for "unique" but I don't have it.

item.title: Chat text color & starting outfit
item.dc:creator: @T33J4Y T33J4Y
item.description:
